session_summary.primary_mission: Finish FreeRideInvestor V2 deploy, remove stale Developer Tools traces, harden WordPress deployer
session_summary.progress: Uploaded missing theme.js, purged caches, added --remote-path flag for single-file SFTP deploys

theme_js_restored.details: Uploaded js/theme.js to wp-content/themes/freerideinvestor; now serves 200 (10,330 bytes)

cache_purge.details: Ran wordpress_manager --purge-cache (wp cli cache + litespeed) after theme replace

single_file_deploy_flag.details: wordpress_manager.py now supports --remote-path for targeted uploads; used to land theme.js

new_tools: tools/tsla_daily_plan_poster.py (daily WP post helper using app password)

next_actions: Log into wp-admin: Settings -> Permalinks -> Save Changes (forces rewrite + cache refresh)
Hard refresh homepage and confirm clean text + single Home menu; report if any 404s remain
Optionally enable the TradingView/TSLA autopost workflow with tsla_daily_plan_poster.py when ready
blockers: Requires wp-admin access to save permalinks and finalize cache flush
coordination_needs: Captain/Owner: please perform wp-admin permalinks Save to lock in V2 assets
Agent-1: reuse wordpress_manager --remote-path for future single-file fixes (Hostinger SFTP 65002)
key_achievements: Theme JS restored; no more 404 on theme.js
Cache purged via CLI; ready for permalinks save
Single-file deploys now support explicit remote paths
lessons_learned: Single-file SFTP deploys need explicit remote paths when theme resides outside default structure
After theme replace, verify assets (CSS/JS) and force permalinks save to clear WordPress caches
swarm_contributions: Remote-path capable wordpress_manager for precise uploads
TSLA daily plan poster helper for rapid content automation
Documented live asset verification results post-deploy
